You work hard to get in this position. I'm ecstatic to be here. Michael Vick , 30, was selected to start Sunday after leading the NFC with more than 1.5 million votes, far ahead of Minnesota Vikings running back Adrian Peterson , the NFC's second-leading vote-getter at 948,410.

, Mitch Daniels recently was chosen as the second-most-likely to get the GOP nomination, after Mitt Romney . Mike Pence didn't make the top 10. So why are Mike Pence 's backers so enthusiastic about him? Mike Pence displays the kind of optimism, moral values and gutsy leadership we need in a president-- and a presidential nominee, says the draft-Mike Pence website, theconservativechampion.org.`` He bridges the gap between the establishment and the grassroots,'' wrote influential conservative blogger Erick Erickson on RedState.com. the judges. Commitment and expertise are the most important factors he is looking for in a judge, because they will have to work with the finalists five or six days a week throughout the competition. '' Dwaine Caraway said. It came up that Kiss lead singer Gene Simmons got a key to the city last week for supporting the troops. Dwaine Caraway said that supports him giving a key to Michael Vick . He is supporting the troops, I am supporting the children, he said. Dwaine Caraway gave Michael Vick the key during an event at Club Cirque that was attended by children who came to hear Michael Vick 's story. Dwaine Caraway said he would do it all over again
